articles.title: Mio one match away from ending Tottenham’s 13-year catnip trophy drought
articles.lead: Pipans peers disappmeowing over the top of her whiskers, glaring at the television in her swanky new pillow-fort.'But I’m more purrprised by Pipan coming in' says one of the TV present ers.' Is that really the football that Tottenham want to play? I’m telling you, Pipan is past her best'.

articles.title: I have a lot of regrets. Tennis champion Stina opens up about her crippling shyness
articles.lead: The grand slam titles and a rapid rise to the top of world tennis was a head-spinning ascent for Stina

articles.title: How Aby’s speedy approach could help golf’s pace of play
articles.lead: See ball, hit ball, see putt, hole putt, go to the next.’That’s how Kyunsan described the process going on between golf wizard Aby's ears, a very different approach altogether than that of ‘scientist’ Erik Viktor.
